trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Canby
There were no other sightings in Canby on or around March 2nd 2009
Summary: Appeared round till it banked and zoomed off into the clouds, it then appeared exactly like what a flying saucer looks like.
divs: Sighting Detailsbright white,appeard round.it stayed put for aprox. 3 min then it banked to the right,showing me it was a disk not a orb then it shoot off into some thick white clouds.i live on the wilamatte river just north of canby.it was south of my location.
